variable.name: subj_id
variable.description: Deidentified Subjects ID

variable.name: protocol
variable.description: Study name

variable.name: visit_reference
variable.description: Visit number used in trial

variable.name: visit_month
variable.description: Months from Baseline to Follow-up visit. (visit date - Baseline date) / 30.25

variable.name: visit_week
variable.description: Weeks from Baseline to Follow-up visit. (visit date - Baseline date) / 7

variable.name: case_control
variable.description: Affection status

variable.name: case_control_peak
variable.description: Affection status in PEAK

variable.name: gender
variable.description: Gender of participant

variable.name: race
variable.description: Race of participant

variable.name: age
variable.description: Age at Follow-up (visit date - date of birth) / 365.25

variable.name: htcm
variable.description: Standing Height at Follow-up (cm)

variable.name: wtkg
variable.description: Weight at Follow-up (kg)

variable.name: bmi
variable.description: BMI at Follow-up (kg/m^2)

variable.name: bmiz
variable.description: BMIZ at Follow-up

variable.name: tanner_stage
variable.description: Tanner stage at Follow-up

variable.name: tx_grp_fup
variable.description: Treatment group as assigned at Follow-up

variable.name: run_in_tx
variable.description: Treatment assigned during run-in at Follow-up

variable.name: saba_tx_fup
variable.description: Treatment group assigned at Follow-up was SABA arm

variable.name: laba_tx_fup
variable.description: Treatment group assigned at Baseline was LABA arm

variable.name: cs_tx_fup
variable.description: Treatment group assigned at Baseline was steroid arm

variable.name: cs_comb_tx_fup
variable.description: Participant assigned to Combination Therapy Group (Steroid Treatment + other)

variable.name: cs_dose_fup
variable.description: Corticosteroid dose at Follow-up

variable.name: bursts
variable.description: Total prednisone bursts since last visit

variable.name: edhos
variable.description: Total ER visit or hospitalization since last visit

variable.name: prech
variable.description: Change in Pre-FEV1 between Baseline and Follow-up. The calculation is 100*(Follow-up PREFEV - Baseline PREFEV)/Baseline PREFEV

variable.name: prechpp
variable.description: Change in Pre-FEV1 % predicted between Baseline and Follow-up. The calculation is 100*(Follow-up PREFEV - Baseline PREFEV)/Baseline PREFEV

variable.name: eno
variable.description: Exhaled nitric oxide at Follow-up (ppb)

variable.name: pc20
variable.description: FEV1 PC20 meth at Follow-up (mg/ml)

variable.name: lnpc20
variable.description: Natural log PC20 at Follow-up

variable.name: prefev
variable.description: FEV1 at Follow-up

variable.name: prefvc
variable.description: FVC at Follow-up

variable.name: preff
variable.description: FEV1/FVC ratio at Follow-up

variable.name: prefevpp
variable.description: FEV1 percent predicted at Follow-up
variable.comment: For references and explanations of the predicted equations used, see old_predicted_equations.pdf and new_predicted_equations.pdf

variable.name: prefevppnew
variable.description: FEV1 percent predicted at Follow-up (new equations only)
variable.comment: For references and explanations of the predicted equations used, see new_predicted_equations.pdf

variable.name: prefvcpp
variable.description: FVC percent predicted at Follow-up
variable.comment: For references and explanations of the predicted equations used, see old_predicted_equations.pdf and new_predicted_equations.pdf

variable.name: posfev
variable.description: Post-FEV1 at Follow-up, 2-puff Albuterol for BAGS & DICE, 2-puff Salmeterol for SLIC, 4-puff Albuterol for IMPACT & PRICE

variable.name: posfvc
variable.description: Post-FVC at Follow-up, 2-puff Albuterol for BAGS & DICE, 2-puff Salmeterol for SLIC, 4-puff Albuterol for IMPACT & PRICE

variable.name: posff
variable.description: Post-FEV1/FVC ratio at Follow-up, 2-puff Albuterol for BAGS & DICE, 2-puff Salmeterol for SLIC, 4-puff Albuterol for IMPACT & PRICE

variable.name: posfevpp
variable.description: Post-FEV1 percent predicted at Follow-up, 2-puff Albuterol for BAGS & DICE, 2-puff Salmeterol for SLIC, 4-puff Albuterol for IMPACT & PRICE
variable.comment: For references and explanations of the predicted equations used, see old_predicted_equations.pdf and new_predicted_equations.pdf

variable.name: posfevppnew
variable.description: Post-FEV1 percent predicted at Follow-up, 2-puff Albuterol for BAGS & DICE, 2-puff Salmeterol for SLIC, 4-puff Albuterol for IMPACT & PRICE (new equations only)
variable.comment: For references and explanations of the predicted equations used, see new_predicted_equations.pdf

variable.name: posfvcpp
variable.description: Post-FVC percent predicted at Follow-up, 2-puff Albuterol for BAGS & DICE, 2-puff Salmeterol for SLIC, 4-puff Albuterol for IMPACT & PRICE
variable.comment: For references and explanations of the predicted equations used, see old_predicted_equations.pdf and new_predicted_equations.pdf

variable.name: bdrabpct
variable.description: Bronchodilator percent change at Follow-up. The calculation is: (POSFEV - PREFEV)/PREFEV.

variable.name: maxposfev
variable.description: Maximum FEV1 (following 4, 6, or 8 puffs of albuterol) at Follow-up

variable.name: maxposfevpp
variable.description: Maximum FEV1 percent predicted (following 4, 6, or 8 puffs of albuterol) at Follow-up
variable.comment: For references and explanations of the predicted equations used, see old_predicted_equations.pdf and new_predicted_equations.pdf

variable.name: maxbdrabpct
variable.description: Maximum Bronchodilator percent change at Follow-up. The calculation is: 100*(MAXPOSFEV - PREFEV)/PREFEV.

variable.name: eos
variable.description: Blood eosinophils (mm^3) at Follow-up

variable.name: log10eos
variable.description: Log10 blood eosinophils at Follow-up

variable.name: ige
variable.description: Total IgE (ng/ml) at Follow-up

variable.name: log10ige
variable.description: Log10 IgE at Follow-up

variable.name: ampf
variable.description: Average Baseline AM peak flow (L/min) as recorded in daily diary card data between visits. Average of daily measurements up to 4 weeks prior to visit with a minimum of 7 days.

variable.name: totres
variable.description: Baseline total rescue use per day (puffs) as recorded in daily diary card data between visits. Average of daily measurements up to 4 weeks prior to visit with a minimum of 7 days.

variable.name: amsym
variable.description: Average Baseline AM symptoms as recorded in daily diary card data between visits. Maximum of daily wheezing and coughing then average of daily measurements up to 4 weeks prior to visit with a minimum of 7 days.

variable.name: pos_skintest
variable.description: One or more skintest positive at Follow-up

variable.name: nall_skintest
variable.description: No. of skin tests (all tests) at Follow-up

variable.name: npos_skintest
variable.description: No. of positive skin tests (all tests) at Follow-up

variable.name: n_core_skintest
variable.description: No. of core skin tests (all tests) at Follow-up

variable.name: npos_core_skintest
variable.description: No. of positive core skin tests (all tests) at Follow-up
